title: Google Play Store will soon prevent you from downloading outdated apps
content:
Apple has repeatedly purged apps from the App Store that aren’t built for the latest iPhone models or newer versions of iOS, which is usually beneficial for the overall software experience but has made the preservation of old apps and games much more difficult.
